TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TrackingWorkflowExceptionEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 包含与工作流实例执行过程中发生的异常关联的数据。

span.span: Contains data associated with an exception that occurs during the execution of a workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 当工作流实例执行过程中发生异常，并且与该工作流实例关联的 包括针对 配置的 时，工作流跟踪基础结构会在它发送到跟踪服务的 中将 设置为 。When an exception occurs during the execution of a workflow instance and a that is associated with the workflow instance includes a configured for a , the workflow tracking infrastructure sets to an in the that it sends to the tracking service. > [!NOTE] > 仅由运行时跟踪服务使用，以在 中传递信息。 is used only by the runtime tracking service to pass information in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，该方法可捕获 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 代码将检查 属性是否为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，代码会将与 属性关联的消息写入控制台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 此外，代码会将 属性的值转换为字符串，并将其写入控制台。In addition, the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 EventArgs 跟踪 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EventArgs 跟踪示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#289](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#289)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#289](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#289)]

summary.span: 获取当前引发异常的活动的 。

span.span: Gets the of the activity currently throwing the exception.

value.span: 当前引发异常的活动的 。

span.span: The of the activity currently throwing the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常将在一系列异常处理程序活动中向上传递。Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities. 异常处理程序可能会选择再次引发异常。An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again. 当异常处理程序再次引发异常时，将会在运行时跟踪基础结构中引发一个包含新 的新异常跟踪事件。When an exception handler throws the exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 引用当前引发异常的活动。 refers to the activity that is currently throwing the exception.

public: property Exception ^ Exception { Exception ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取工作流实例所引发的 。

span.span: Gets the that is being thrown by the workflow instance.

value.span: 工作流实例引发的异常 。

span.span: The exception that is being thrown by the workflow instance.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，该方法可捕获 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 代码将检查 属性是否为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，代码会将与 属性关联的消息写入控制台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果异常为 `null` (`Nothing`)，则代码会将 属性的值转换为字符串，并将其写入控制台。If Exception is `null` (`Nothing`), the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 EventArgs 跟踪 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EventArgs 跟踪示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c). remarks.format: ## Remarks 异常将在一系列异常处理程序活动中向上传递。Exceptions are passed up the chain of exception handler activities. 异常处理程序可能会选择再次引发异常。An exception handler may choose to throw an exception again. 当异常处理程序再次引发异常时，将会在运行时跟踪基础结构中引发一个包含新 的新异常跟踪事件。When an exception handler throws an exception again, a new exception tracking event containing a new is raised to the runtime tracking infrastructure. 引用原来引发异常的活动。 refers to the activity that originally threw the exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个名为 `WriteExceptionEventArgs` 的方法，该方法可捕获 。The following code example demonstrates a method, named `WriteExceptionEventArgs`, which captures a . 代码将检查 属性是否为 `null`（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。The code checks whether the property is `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). 如果不是，代码会将与 属性关联的消息写入控制台。If it is not, the code writes the message associated with the property to the console. 如果 为 `null` (`Nothing`)，代码会将 属性的值转换为字符串，并将其写入控制台。If is `null` (`Nothing`), the code converts the value of the property to a string and writes it to the console. 此代码示例摘自 Program.cs 文件中的 EventArgs 跟踪 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the EventArgs Tracking SDK Sample from the Program.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅[EventArgs 跟踪示例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c)。For more information, see [EventArgs Tracking Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/94818da2-c3c4-4a13-b47a-a0fb30dbbf1c).
